headline: Be a good person and buy boring stocks: Wall Street reflects on Warren Buffett's wisdom
summary: The wisdom of Warren Buffett has had a lasting impact on Wall Street's many money managers.

headline: Trust Maintains a Hold Call on Citizens Financial Group (CFG), Noting Slight EPS Contraction in Banking Sector
summary: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE:CFG) is one of the new stocks David Tepper has bought. As of December 29, the average price target for CFG suggests a 5% upside; however, the Street high indicates a 25% upside. headline: Truist Maintains Hold Recommendation on KeyCorp (KEY)
summary: KeyCorp (NYSE:KEY) is one of the new stocks David Tepper has bought. headline: DigitalBridge lowered to Hold at Truist as SoftBank deal caps upside
summary: Investing.com -- Truist Securities analyst Anthony Hau downgraded DigitalBridge Group to Hold from Buy after SoftBank Group agreed to acquire the data center investment firm in an all-cash transaction priced at $16.00 per share, saying upside is now limited with the stock trading close to the agreed takeout level.
